alert.note: Alert for Harrison (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 04 at 2:49PM CST until February 07 at 12:00AM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Wolf River Above Gulfport affecting Harrison County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO EARLY MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wolf River Above Gulfport. * WHEN...From this afternoon to early Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Bells Ferry Road will be closed within a mile of the bridge as the road will be covered by swift moving river current. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:45 PM CST Friday the stage was 8.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 10.0 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 10.0 feet on 04/16/2015. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/lix. Click on the Rivers and Lakes menu for forecasts and observations. The next statement will be issued when updates are needed.
